thread.title_full: Clueless fashion: The influential looks from Clueless | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Clueless fashion: The influential looks from Clueless | The
text:
Cher (Alicia Silverstone), Dionne (Stacey Dash) and Tai (Brittany Murphy) set trends in 1995 with their preppy Beverly Hills schoolgirl style and the look is back in vogue 20 years after the movie was released.
Trendsetters ... Dionne (Stacey Dash) and Cher (Alicia Silverstone), wearing her famous Dolce & Gabbana check blazer, in a scene from Clueless. Picture: Paramount. Source: Supplied
This weekend marks two decades since Clueless brought “as if”, “Audi” (goodbye) and “buggin’” (freaked out) into the pop culture lexicon (not to mention Cher’s yellow Dolce & Gabbana tartan blazer).
Fierce ... Cher and Dionne rocked 90s headwear. Source: Supplied
Shop ‘til you drop ... Cher (Alicia Silverstone) on Rodeo Drive. Source: Supplied
Sheer style ... Cher’s wardrobe included see-through shirts teamed with cotton tanks, while Josh (Paul Rudd) sported printed tees. Source: Supplied
A MODERN TAKE ON CLUELESS STYLE
CHECK shirts, patent leather loafers, fitted blazers and knitted berets are all trending this winter, styled with a contemporary interpretation of the Clueless look in News Corp Australia’s shoot.
They’re best accessorised when using Clueless -isms like “rollin’ with the homies”, “I hope not sporadically” and “whatever”.
Modern take on Clueless ... models styled as Cher, centre, Tai (left) and Dionne (right) in Clueless-inspired looks from Westfield Doncaster. Full outfit details at the end. Picture: Nicole Cleary Source: News Corp Australia
90s style ... Clueless-inspired over-the-knee socks, printed minis and denim teamed with checks. Picture: Nicole Cleary Source: News Corp Australia
The movie’s style is still influential with even Taylor Swift wearing Clueless -esque tartan mini skirts.
The new Clueless style can be seen in the winter collections of labels including Nicholas, Cameo, Gorman, Marcs, MINKPINK, Marc by Marc Jacobs and Guess.
Beverly Hills party look ... Cher in that red slip dress, Tai in a fringed two-piece and Dionne in signature checks. Picture: Nicole Cleary Source: News Corp Australia
The movie’s costume designer Mona May told The Daily Beast she wanted to take “the classics to a new level while making sure each girl’s outfit was consistent with her character”.
As if ... Clueless is known for textured fabrics. Source: News Corp Australia
Buggin’ . tailored basics defined Cher’s look. Source: News Corp Australia
“I could never go too crazy with Cher because Dionne had to look more wild, so it was always this balancing act.”
Strappy style ... Nine West Ladyfinger heels ($159.95), Nine West Tatiana stilettos ($139.95), and Witchery Lara heels ($179.95), from Westfield Doncaster. Picture: Nicole Cleary Source: News Corp Australia
“That kind of fresh sexiness is missing in our culture,” May said, according to thedailybeast.com . “And I think that’s a kind of style expression that we don’t often see in real life.”
GET THE LOOKS
LOOK 1: SHOPPING
Cher : Nicholas shirt $240 and Cameo coat $229 from David Jones, Witchery skirt $129.95, Marc by Marc Jacobs Bag at David Jones $177.80, Seed beanie $29.95, Cotton On socks $9.95 and Nine West loafers $129.95.
Tai : Marcs knit at David Jones $159, Sportsgirl shorts $79.95, Witchery jacket $159.95, Tony Bianco clutch and Seed sneakers $59.95.
Dionne : Gorman knit $189, Gorman skirt $199 and jacket $269, Witchery clutch $69.95 and Gorman loafers $269.
Blonde ambition ... Alicia Silverstone as Cher in Clueless is still a fashionable force even 20 years on. Source: Supplied
LOOK 2: SCHOOL
Cher : Sportsgirl top $119.95 and skirt $79.95, Seed backpack $99.95, Cotton On Knee-Hi Socks $9.95 and Nine West loafers $129.95.
Tai : Marcs jacket at David Jones $279, MINKPINK dress $89.95, Rails Tartan Shirt at David Jones (worn around waist) $219, Marcs bag at David Jones $149 and Witchery sneakers $129.95.
Dionne : Witchery top $69.95, Gorman skirt $199, Country Road fedora $59.95, Seed necklace $29.95 and Nine West boots $179.95 .
LOOK 3: PARTY
Cher : Shona Joy dress at David Jones $260, Seed clutch $69.95, Witchery cuff $49.95 and Nine West heels $139.95.
Tai : Seed top $189.95 and Skirt $249.95, Witchery bag $89.95, bangles $39.95-$49.95 and Nine West heels $159.95.
Dionne : Cue dress $329, Alannah Hill belt at David Jones $89, Fossil bag at David Jones $149, Witchery ring $29.95 and heels $179.95.
All clothes are available from Westfield Doncaster. See westfield.com.au/doncaster . Models Jess K, Caitlin S and Natasha from Giant Management.
Originally published as How to get the Clueless look today
